title: Peptiban 60ML Susp
details: Famotidine is known as an H2 blocker. It works by reducing the amount of acid in your stomach. It is used to prevent and treat heartburn and other symptoms caused by too much acid in the stomach (acid indigestion)
precautions: Before taking famotidine, tell your doctor or pharmacist if you are allergic to it; or to other H2 blockers (e.g., cimetidine, ranitidine); or if you have any other allergies. This product may contain inactive ingredients, which can cause allergic reactions or other problems. Talk to your pharmacist for more details. If you have any of the following health problems, consult your doctor or pharmacist before using this medication kidney problems, liver problems, other stomach problems (e.g., tumors). Some symptoms may actually be signs of a more serious condition. Get medical help right away if you have heartburn with lightheadedness/sweating/dizziness, chest/jaw/arm/shoulder pain (especially with shortness of breath, unusual sweating), unexplained weight loss. In addition, before you self-treat with this medication, get medical help right away if you have any of these signs of a serious condition trouble/pain swallowing food, bloody vomit, vomit that looks like coffee grounds, bloody/black stools, heartburn for over 3 months, frequent chest pain, frequent wheezing (especially with heartburn), nausea/vomiting, stomach pain.
effects: Headache, Constipation, or Diarrhea may occur. Serious side effects are Easy Bruising/Bleeding, signs of Infection (such as Sore throat that doesn't go away, Fever, Chills), Mental/Mood changes (e.g., Restlessness, Confusion, Depression, allucinations) and Allergic reactions.

title: Gaviscon 120ML Syp
details:
Gaviscon syrup has ingredients, sodium alginate, calcium carbonate and sodium bicarbonate. Gaviscon syrup has a generic name called aluminium hydroxide 95mg and magnesium carbonate 358mg per 15mL. 

This medicine works as an antiacid. I

READ MORE
precautions: As Gaviscon syrup has aluminium and magnesium in it. Tell your doctor if you have any allergies to these two ingredients. Tell your doctor about not only these two but also other allergies because there must be some other inactive ingredients in this medicine that your doctor knows better than you.If you have dehydration, kidney problems such as kidney stones must tell your doctor before taking this drug. In the case of pregnancy, this medicine must be taken only on the advice of your doctor or if there is a severe need of taking this syrup. This medicine can also pass into breast milk. So, consult your doctor before taking it if you are breastfeeding. Shake the syrup well before using it always. The people who are hoping to get pregnant should first contact their doctors before taking this medicine.
effects: Every medicine comes with its side effects; it is not important that every person using this medicine is likely to have these side effects. These side effects are very less likely to be noticed by some of the users. There are some temporary side effects of this syrup. As our body takes some time to adjust to some of the new medication that we start. If that drug contains something that does not suit our body or if we have some allergy to one of its constituents, then some conditions can occur.Side effects of Gaviscon syrup include nausea, constipation, diarrhoea or headache. These are some of the common symptoms that occur due to the intake of this syrup. It is not necessary that these symptoms will definitely occur to the person taking it.If your doctor has given this drug to you, then keep that in mind that the benefit this medicine going to give you is much more than the loss it is going to give you through its side effects. If the side effects are persistent and the pain is not going for a long time, then must consult your doctor.One thing that one should know is that the medicine containing aluminium can cause constipation as a side effect, and medicine containing magnesium can cause diarrhoea as a side effect. To lessen the chance of constipation, drink a lot of water in your daily routine. Diarrhoea is more likely to happen by taking this medicine.The use of aluminium-containing medicine can cause a decrease in phosphate in the body. This low phosphate in the body can cause tiredness, loss of appetite and muscle weakness. If you feel any of these symptoms contact your physician right away because a decrease in the body's phosphate level can cause a serious problem in your body.Some of the serious side effects of this medicine that require an immediate consultation are black or tarry faeces, breathing rate getting down, heartbeat not regular, mental switches, pain with urination, allergic reactions such as rash, itching especially on the face, throat and tongue and severe dizziness. This is not a complete list of side effects; there are some other side effects that can occur. If you feel any other serious symptoms, feel free to ask your doctor about them.

title: Polypep 40MG Tab 1x10 (L)
details: Famotidine is known as an H2 blocker. It works by reducing the amount of acid in your stomach. It is used to prevent and treat heartburn and other symptoms caused by too much acid in the stomach (acid indigestion)
precautions: Before taking famotidine, tell your doctor or pharmacist if you are allergic to it; or to other H2 blockers (e.g., cimetidine, ranitidine); or if you have any other allergies. This product may contain inactive ingredients, which can cause allergic reactions or other problems. Talk to your pharmacist for more details. If you have any of the following health problems, consult your doctor or pharmacist before using this medication kidney problems, liver problems, other stomach problems (e.g., tumors). Some symptoms may actually be signs of a more serious condition. Get medical help right away if you have heartburn with lightheadedness/sweating/dizziness, chest/jaw/arm/shoulder pain (especially with shortness of breath, unusual sweating), unexplained weight loss. In addition, before you self-treat with this medication, get medical help right away if you have any of these signs of a serious condition trouble/pain swallowing food, bloody vomit, vomit that looks like coffee grounds, bloody/black stools, heartburn for over 3 months, frequent chest pain, frequent wheezing (especially with heartburn), nausea/vomiting, stomach pain.
effects: Headache, Constipation, or Diarrhea may occur. Serious side effects are Easy Bruising/Bleeding, signs of Infection (such as Sore throat that doesn't go away, Fever, Chills), Mental/Mood changes (e.g., Restlessness, Confusion, Depression, allucinations) and Allergic reactions.
